bad_caption: A cyclist pedals quickly down a sunlit city street lined with tall palm trees, weaving between parked cars and passing pedestrians. As the cyclist approaches a busy intersection, a group of skateboarders crosses in front, prompting the cyclist to slow down and wait. After the skateboarders pass, the cyclist resumes riding and disappears around a corner at the end of the block.
